abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column praises Starbucks CEO Howard Schultz for his ambitious Create Jobs for USA plan, which will allow citizens to lend money to small businesses with the help of Starbucks and several financial institutions; observes that since the government or banks have been unwilling or unable to help, it is up to individual Americans to do so.
snippet: Howard Schultz is back with Big Idea No. 2. With the help of Starbucks, we the people can do what government and the banks won’t: make loans to small businesses.
lead_paragraph: Howard Schultz is back with Big Idea No. 2. With the help of Starbucks, we the people can do what government and the banks won’t: make loans to small businesses.

headline.main: We Can All Become Job Creators
headline.seo: We Can All Become Job Creators
headline.print_headline: We Can All Become Job Creators
